subject: Traffic and Parking Violations
Sentences (Criminal)
lead_paragraph: The former N.B.A. player and ESPN analyst Jalen Rose was given a speeding ticket in suburban Detroit hours after he was sentenced to nearly three weeks in jail for drunken driving, the police said.
snippet: The former N.B.A. player and ESPN analyst Jalen Rose was given a speeding ticket in suburban Detroit hours after he was sentenced to nearly three weeks in jail for drunken driving, the police said.
